name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene EPPERSON, Appellant

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gilbert B. Abramson, Philadelphia, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
372 A.2d 1201
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene EPPERSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 18, 1977.
Decided May 17, 1977.
Gilbert B. Abramson, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett ■ Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., Arthur James, Philadelphia, Pa., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
